articles.author: Justin Low
articles.title: US futures erase the earlier drop from Israel-Iran fears - ForexLive
articles.description: S&P 500 futures At the low earlier, S&P 500 futures were down by roughly 1.7%. It is now down just 0.4% as European markets open for trading.
